DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate safety efficacy Replenine®-VF administer appropriate dosage bolus infusion prevent bleed achieve haemostasis subject haemophilia B undergoing surgery .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-study Investigate Safety Efficacy Replenine®-VF Haemophilia B Subjects Undergoing Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects moderate severe haemophilia B undergoing major surgery require inpatient stay generally 5 10 day .
